target.name: password
target.description: Prints out hashed passwords for seeding database values
target.groovy:
import org.jcatapult.security.JCEPasswordEncryptor import org.jcatapult.security.SaltSource import org.jcatapult.security.config.SecurityConfiguration
def ss = [getSalt: {return properties["salt"]}] as SaltSource def sc = [isBase64Encoded: {return true}, getAlgorithm: {return "MD5"}] as SecurityConfiguration def password = new JCEPasswordEncryptor(ss, sc).encryptPassword(properties["password"]) ant.echo("Encoded password is ${password}");
